articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Watch: Son Heung-min smashes thunderous 104th minute free-kick winner for Korea - Hindustan Times
articles.description: South Korea captain Son Heung-min stepped up to send his side to the semi-finals of the Asian Cup. | Football News
articles.content: Son Heung-min came through in clutch moments for South Korea, securing a 2-1 victory over Australia in extra time with a spectacular free-kick. This win propelled South Korea into the Asian Cup semi-… [+1918 chars]
